  • struct utils::IntrinsicParams

struct utils::IntrinsicParams¶

Overview¶

Holds camera intrinsic projection parameters. More…

#include <IntrinsicParams.h>

struct IntrinsicParams {
    // fields

    float fx;
    float fy;
    float cx;
    float cy;

    // construction

    IntrinsicParams();
    IntrinsicParams(float t_fx, float t_fy, float t_cx, float t_cy);

    // methods

    float GetFovX() const;
    float GetFovY() const;
};

Detailed Documentation¶

Holds camera intrinsic projection parameters.

More information about intrinsic camera parameters can be found on Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Camera_resectioning and distortion coefficients at https://docs.opencv.org/2.4/doc/tutorials/calib3d/camera_calibration/camera_calibration.html

Fields¶

float fx

Focal length in terms of pixels.

float cx

Principal point coordinates. Ideally in the center of the image.

Methods¶

float GetFovX() const

Calculates horizontal field of view. In radians.

float GetFovY() const

Calculates vertical field of view. In radians.
